title: What can I do if my phone can't find a 4G network after I turned it on?
answer:
l   Make sure you are within the 4G network coverage.

l   Open the notification panel, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131026519001.png) to quickly turn off the 4G network, and touch again to turn it back on.

l   Restart your phone.
